law.catch_line: Separate living facilities for the two sexes not prohibited.
law.text: Nothing contained in KRS 344.550 to 344.575 shall be construed to prohibit any educational institution receiving funds under KRS 344.550 to 344.575 from maintaining separate living facilities for the different sexes.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 462, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990.
